pages.text: $(o)"In the moonlight, $(t:congratulations, you got the referrence)the Moth$()$(o) flutters towards the moon so as to never reach it. $(br)But why even try in the first place? Because you must."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with an $(l:alchemy/entry_entropizing_catalyst)Entropizing Catalyst$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Chaos$() aspect.
